channel.title: Neutrals dragging the final trial out endlessly
channel.description:
Okay, I was just in a game where i was the sole BD left with an evil king and a scorned. The scorned kept demanding things to vote for either side, not deciding at all. It continued 3 times before it would end in a draw and i had enough. He demanded i would "sing" a serenade for him to get his vote, while the king argued his own things. I was Psychic, linking him with the dead. Still he did nothing to end the game until i had enough when he demanded the serenade.
It really ruins the game experience when a narcissistic personality abuses the game to get his ego stroked on behalf of so many others, who just want the game to end so they can get into a new one.
I am not sure how to deal with this issue, but it sure ruined a good game for me.

item.title: Neutrals dragging the final trial out endlessly
item.dc:creator: Thundie85
item.description:
I did what i could within my limits. I am not going to degrade myself in front of someone who kept voting and pardoning for 3 days in the game, still wanting ego stroked. Yeah, he was not obligated to vote a certain side, but the thing is, he did not vote for anyone, he just kept it going left and right, playing both me and the king.

Then when i didnt want to play after his tune, he finally sided with the king. If i hadn’t snapped, it would have gone into a draw.

item.description:
Scorned is Neutral, they’re not really obligated to vote for either side. After their targets are dead there’s not much left for them to do. Many other Neutral’s are the same way, except for Mercenary most of the time.

Next time just be more persuasive with swinging the Neutral vote in your favor, is all I can suggest. This is a problem that will never go away so as long as there’s a Neutral faction.
